Package net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage

Interface Datable<O>

Type Parameters:
O - The object that is going to be stored/loaded from the database.

  • Method Details

    • clazz

      Class<? extends O> clazz()
      The class that is represented by the O parameter.
      Returns:
      The class that represents the parameter.

    • purge

      void purge(StorageConnector<?> connector)
      USed to purge the objects of this datable.
      Parameters:
      connector - The storage connector to use for this transaction.

    • store

      void store(StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull O object, @Nullable @Nullable String identifier)
      Used to store this object.
      Parameters:
      connector - The storage connector to use for this transaction.
      object - The object to be stored.
      identifier - An optional identifier for loading this object. Note: some Datables may require this identifier.

    • storeAll

      void storeAll(StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable @Nullable String identifier)
      Used to store all objects of this type.
      Parameters:
      connector - The storage connector to use for this transaction.
      identifier - The identifier used to load objects, if they relate to a specific identifier, otherwise this will be null.

    • load

      Optional<O> load(StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull @NotNull String identifier)
      Used to load this object.
      Parameters:
      connector - The storage connector to use for this transaction.
      identifier - The identifier used to identify the object to load.
      Returns:
      The object to load.

    • loadAll

      Collection<O> loadAll(StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable @Nullable String identifier)
      Used to load all objects of this type.
      Parameters:
      connector - The storage connector to use for this transaction.
      identifier - The identifier used to load objects, if they relate to a specific identifier, otherwise this will be null.
      Returns:
      A collection containing the objects loaded.
